translations: 卷发夹；冰壶运动员（curler 的复数）

sentences.sentence: All men are afraid of eyelash curlers.
The Chinese women curlers team lost to bottom-placed Russia 4-7 Tuesday.
sentences.translation: 中国女子冰壶队23日爆冷以4 - 7负于排名垫底的俄罗斯队。

sentences.sentence: I like to think that this change of environment made them look like next-generation hair curlers.
sentences.translation: 我想到环境的改变让我看起来像是新生代的卷发家。
